order by bidx desc ) A where rownum <= #{page}*#{perPageNum}) B where B.rnum >=(#{page}-1)*#{perPageNum}+1

select B.rnum,B.* from (select rownum as rnum, A.* from (select * from bclass_board C inner join bclass_member2 D on C.midx=D.midx where bdelyn='N' and C.midx=#{midx}
order by bidx desc ) A where rownum <= #{scri.page}*#{scri.perPageNum}) B where B.rnum >=(#{scri.page}-1)*#{scri.perPageNum}+1
select * from bclass_board where bdelyn='N' and bidx = #{bidx}

select B.rnum,B.* from (select rownum as rnum, A.* from (select * from bclass_comment C inner join bclass_member2 D on C.midx=D.midx where cdelyn='N' and bidx=#{bidx} order by cidx desc) A where rownum <= 5) B where B.rnum >=1
mapper.update: update bclass_comment set cdelYn='Y',writeday=sysdate where cidx=#{cidx}
mapper.select: select B.rnum,B.* from (select rownum as rnum, A.* from (select * from bclass_comment C inner join bclass_member2 D on C.midx=D.midx where cdelyn='N' and bidx=#{bidx} order by cidx desc) A where rownum <= 5*#{page}) B where B.rnum >=1
